程序包 uk.ac.ed.inf

类 PathUtils

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.PathUtils
public class PathUtils
extends java.lang.Object

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    PathUtils()  

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static java.util.List<LongLat> advanceOrganizePath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, double upperOffset, double lowerOffset, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to use to calculate the path from starting point to ending point by offset the slope of both start and end points by different degree to form a triangle which meet the condition of the degree with multiple of 10.
    static int batteryCalculator​(java.util.List<LongLat> path)
    Method to calculate the battery cost of the input path
    static int batteryCalculator​(LongLat start, LongLat end)
    Method to calculate the battery cost to move from the input start to end
    static boolean canFly​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to check if the line connected the starting point and ending point touches or too close to the no-fly zones.
    static java.util.List<LongLat> chooseShortestPath​(java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> pathOptions)
    Method to find the shortest (the lowest battery cost) path among all input paths
    static int degreeTwoPoints​(LongLat start, LongLat end)
    Method to calculate the degree of the direct connected line between start and end respect to X axis
    static double distanceCalculator​(java.util.List<LongLat> pathPoint)
    Method to calculate the total distance of an input path key points list
    static java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> findAllPaths​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to find all direct reachable safe paths from start to end
    static double lowerDegree​(double degree)
    Method used to calculate the greatest multiple of 10 angle less than the input angle.
    static java.util.List<LongLat> naiveOrganizePath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, double slope, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to recursively use a naive way to calculate the path from starting point to ending point by offset the slope of both start and end points by a same increasing degree to form a triangle which meet the condition of the degree with multiple of 10 and not pass the no-fly zones.
    static java.util.List<LongLat> organizePathThoughLandmark​(LongLat start, LongLat landmark, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to use the naive way to find all possible paths through landmarks
    static java.util.List<LongLat> organizeShortestPath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<LongLat> landmarks, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
    Method to find the shortest path among all possible paths using or not using landmarks between the input start and end points
    static java.util.List<LongLat> removeSameLongLat​(java.util.List<LongLat> longLatList)
    Method to remove the same nearby key points in the input path and return
    static double upperDegree​(double degree)
    Method used to calculate the smallest multiple of 10 angle greater than the input angle.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PathUtils

      public PathUtils()

  • 方法详细资料

    • upperDegree

      public static double upperDegree​(double degree)
      Method used to calculate the smallest multiple of 10 angle greater than the input angle. (e.g. input 12.4, return 20.0)
      参数:
      degree - the input degree
      返回:
      the smallest multiple of 10 angle greater than the input angle

    • lowerDegree

      public static double lowerDegree​(double degree)
      Method used to calculate the greatest multiple of 10 angle less than the input angle. (e.g. input 12.4, return 10.0)
      参数:
      degree - the input degree
      返回:
      the greatest multiple of 10 angle less than the input angle

    • canFly

      public static boolean canFly​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to check if the line connected the starting point and ending point touches or too close to the no-fly zones.
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      true if the connected line between the starting point and ending point is safe to fly, false otherwise

    • naiveOrganizePath

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> naiveOrganizePath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, double slope, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to recursively use a naive way to calculate the path from starting point to ending point by offset the slope of both start and end points by a same increasing degree to form a triangle which meet the condition of the degree with multiple of 10 and not pass the no-fly zones. Math details can be found if Design Document 2.2.2
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      slope - the degree to be offset on both start and end points on both clockwise and counterclockwise direction
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      key points list on the available path, null if it is not reachable.

    • advanceOrganizePath

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> advanceOrganizePath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, double upperOffset, double lowerOffset, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to use to calculate the path from starting point to ending point by offset the slope of both start and end points by different degree to form a triangle which meet the condition of the degree with multiple of 10. Math details can be found if Design Document 2.2.2
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      upperOffset - the degree to be offset in the counterclockwise direction on starting point / the degree to be offset in the clockwise direction on ending point
      lowerOffset - the degree to be offset in the clockwise direction on starting point / the degree to be offset in the counterclockwise direction on ending point
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      key points list on the available path, null if it is not reachable.

    • organizeShortestPath

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> organizeShortestPath​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<LongLat> landmarks, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to find the shortest path among all possible paths using or not using landmarks between the input start and end points
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      landmarks - the locations of the landmarks
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      the shortest path key points list

    • findAllPaths

      public static java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> findAllPaths​(LongLat start, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to find all direct reachable safe paths from start to end
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      the list of all possible paths key points list

    • organizePathThoughLandmark

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> organizePathThoughLandmark​(LongLat start, LongLat landmark, LongLat end, java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> noFlyLongLat)
      Method to use the naive way to find all possible paths through landmarks
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      landmark - the locations of the landmarks
      end - the ending position
      noFlyLongLat - the list of the no-fly zones edgepoints
      返回:
      one safe path from start to end through the landmark

    • distanceCalculator

      public static double distanceCalculator​(java.util.List<LongLat> pathPoint)
      Method to calculate the total distance of an input path key points list
      参数:
      pathPoint - path key points list
      返回:
      the total distance to fly this path

    • degreeTwoPoints

      public static int degreeTwoPoints​(LongLat start, LongLat end)
      Method to calculate the degree of the direct connected line between start and end respect to X axis
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      返回:
      the degree of the line between start and end respect to X axis

    • chooseShortestPath

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> chooseShortestPath​(java.util.List<java.util.List<LongLat>> pathOptions)
      Method to find the shortest (the lowest battery cost) path among all input paths
      参数:
      pathOptions - the list of all paths key points list
      返回:
      the paths key points list with the shortest distance (the lowest battery cost)

    • batteryCalculator

      public static int batteryCalculator​(java.util.List<LongLat> path)
      Method to calculate the battery cost of the input path
      参数:
      path - the input path
      返回:
      the battery cost of the input path

    • batteryCalculator

      public static int batteryCalculator​(LongLat start, LongLat end)
      Method to calculate the battery cost to move from the input start to end
      参数:
      start - the starting position
      end - the ending position
      返回:
      the battery cost from the start to end

    • removeSameLongLat

      public static java.util.List<LongLat> removeSameLongLat​(java.util.List<LongLat> longLatList)
      Method to remove the same nearby key points in the input path and return
      参数:
      longLatList - the input path
      返回:
      the input path without nearby same point
